chapters.title: Chapter 48: Near Avendesora
chapters.info: Meise, p. 719—Norlesh and Metalan's only living child, now that Garham is dead, during Aviendha's second step through the crystal columns in Rhuidean the second time. She has not spoken a word for months, ever since her older brother died of exposure. See also Garham; Metalan; Norlesh.
